title: Cusp-transitive 4-manifolds with every cusp section
authors: Jacopo Guoyi Chen and Edoardo Rizzi
abstract:
We realize every closed flat 3-manifold as a cusp section of a complete,
finite-volume hyperbolic 4-manifold whose symmetry group acts transitively on
the set of cusps. Moreover, for every such 3-manifold, a dense subset of its
flat metrics can be realized as cusp sections of a cusp-transitive 4-manifold.
Finally, we prove that there are a lot of 4-manifolds with pairwise isometric
cusps, for any given cusp type.
